title: ICE in trail expression post match expression in Block
body:
### Code ```rust extern "C" { fn printf(s: *const i8, ...); } enum Foo { A, B(T), } fn main() -> i32 { let result = Foo::B(123); match result { Foo::A => unsafe { let a = "A\n\0"; let b = a as *const str; let c = b as *const i8; printf(c); }, Foo::B(x) => unsafe { let a = "Result: %i\n\0"; let b = a as *const str; let c = b as *const i8; printf(c, x); }, } 0 } ``` ### Meta - What version of Rust GCC were you using, git sha if possible. ### Error output ``` Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. ```
Backtrace

``` Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault. 0x000000000117ae63 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::Resolve (expr=0x0, inside_loop=false) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.h:51 51 expr->accept_vis (resolver); (gdb) bt #0 0x000000000117ae63 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::Resolve (expr=0x0, inside_loop=false) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.h:51 #1 0x0000000001187ed0 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckStmt::visit (this=0x7fffffffd070, stmt=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-stmt.h:45 #2 0x00000000010a2f86 in Rust::HIR::ExprStmtWithBlock::accept_vis (this=0x424b5d0, vis=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir-full-test.cc:4469 #3 0x0000000001187e6c in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckStmt::Resolve (stmt=0x424b5d0, inside_loop=false) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-stmt.h:39 #4 0x000000000116da90 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::visit (this=0x7fffffffd230, expr=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check.cc:114 #5 0x00000000010a1e20 in Rust::HIR::BlockExpr::accept_vis (this=0x424b840, vis=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir-full-test.cc:3983 #6 0x000000000117ae80 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::Resolve (expr=0x424b840, inside_loop=false) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.h:51 #7 0x000000000118b264 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckItem::visit (this=0x7fffffffd380, function=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-item.h:218 #8 0x00000000010a2600 in Rust::HIR::Function::accept_vis (this=0x4210c90, vis=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir-full-test.cc:4211 #9 0x000000000118a4d0 in Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckItem::Resolve (item=0x4210c90) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-item.h:41 #10 0x000000000116d7e8 in Rust::Resolver::TypeResolution::Resolve (crate=...) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check.cc:48 #11 0x000000000103fe7f in Rust::Session::parse_file (this=0x4036600 , filename=0x7fffffffe013 "test.rs") at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:578 #12 0x000000000103fa0d in Rust::Session::parse_files (this=0x4036600 , num_files=1, files=0x4221320) at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:468 #13 0x0000000000f0627c in grs_langhook_parse_file () at ../../gccrs/gcc/rust/rust-lang.cc:169 #14 0x0000000001987a35 in compile_file () at ../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.c:458 #15 0x000000000198adf2 in do_compile () at ../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.c:2233 #16 0x000000000198b114 in toplev::main (this=0x7fffffffdac2, argc=19, argv=0x7fffffffdbd8) at ../../gccrs/gcc/toplev.c:2372 #17 0x0000000002eb5b89 in main (argc=19, argv=0x7fffffffdbd8) at ../../gccrs/gcc/main.c:39 ```
